mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address (address_seq, name, zip_code, address1, address2, tel, member_id, default_address) VALUES (seq_address.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{zipCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{tel}, #{memberId}, #{defaultAddress})
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET name = #{name}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, tel = #{tel}, default_address = #{defaultAddress} WHERE address_seq = #{addressSeq}
UPDATE address SET default_address = '0' WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND default_address = '1'
